long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Url Flag Detective shows where is the base of the website you are visiting. A flag is showing on your toolbar so you understand better where you are. The database is built by the users so free feel to send your data by clicking the icon.
